channel.title: ASE on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in ASE on Memo Tut

item.title: Free first-principles calculation using Google Colaboratory
item.description: Recently, for those who can not experiment with the new corona, "Free first-principles calculation for physical property experimenter" https://cometscome.github.io/DFT/build/ I wrote an article, but in the process I learned how to do first-principles calculation only with Google Colab, so I would like to share it here as well. Things necessary Browser Google account Software to use Quantum Espresso: First principles calculation software Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE): Python library for atomic and molecular simulations https://qiita.
